mil3.7.3:1.2: “bhante nagasena, kim tumhe atitassa dukkhassa pahanaya vayamatha”ti?
mil3.7.3:1.4: “Kim pana, bhante, anagatassa dukkhassa pahanaya vayamatha”ti?
mil3.7.3:1.8: “Yadi tumhe na atitassa dukkhassa pahanaya vayamatha, na anagatassa dukkhassa pahanaya vayamatha, na paccuppannassa dukkhassa pahanaya vayamatha, atha kimatthaya vayamatha”ti.
mil3.7.3:1.10: “‘kinti, maharaja, idanca dukkham nirujjheyya, annanca dukkham nuppajjeyya’ti etadatthaya vayamama”ti.
mil3.7.3:2.1: “Atthi pana te, bhante nagasena, anagatam dukkhan”ti?
mil3.7.3:2.3: “Tumhe kho, bhante nagasena, atipandita, ye tumhe asantanam anagatanam dukkhanam pahanaya vayamatha”ti?
mil3.7.3:2.4: “Atthi pana te, maharaja, keci patirajano paccatthika paccamitta paccupatthita honti”ti?
mil3.7.3:2.6: “Kim nu kho, maharaja, tada tumhe parikham khanapeyyatha, pakaram cinapeyyatha gopuram karapeyyatha, attalakam karapeyyatha, dhannam atiharapeyyatha”ti?
mil3.7.3:2.7: “Na hi, bhante, patikacceva tam patiyattam hoti”ti.
mil3.7.3:2.8: “Kim tumhe, maharaja, tada hatthismim sikkheyyatha, assasmim sikkheyyatha, rathasmim sikkheyyatha, dhanusmim sikkheyyatha, tharusmim sikkheyyatha”ti?
mil3.7.3:2.9: “Na hi, bhante, patikacceva tam sikkhitam hoti”ti.
mil3.7.3:2.12: “Kim nu kho, maharaja, atthi anagatam bhayan”ti?
mil3.7.3:2.14: “Tumhe ca kho, maharaja, atipandita, ye tumhe asantanam anagatanam bhayanam patibahanatthaya patiyadetha”ti.
mil3.7.3:3.2: “Tam kim mannasi, maharaja, yada tvam pipasito bhaveyyasi, tada tvam udapanam khanapeyyasi, pokkharanim khanapeyyasi, talakam khanapeyyasi ‘paniyam pivissami’”ti?
mil3.7.3:3.3: “Na hi, bhante, patikacceva tam patiyattam hoti”ti.
mil3.7.3:3.8: “Tumhe kho, maharaja, atipandita, ye tumhe asantanam anagatanam pipasanam patibahanatthaya tam patiyadetha”ti.
mil3.7.3:4.2: “Tam kim mannasi, maharaja, yada tvam bubhukkhito bhaveyyasi, tada tvam khettam kasapeyyasi, salim vapapeyyasi ‘bhattam bhunjissami’”ti?
mil3.7.3:4.3: “Na hi, bhante, patikacceva tam patiyattam hoti”ti.
mil3.7.3:4.8: “Tumhe kho, maharaja, atipandita, ye tumhe asantanam anagatanam bubhukkhanam patibahanatthaya patiyadetha”ti.
